UseCustomPlayerScale.title: Use Custom Player Scale
UseCustomPlayerScale.tooltip: Overrides the player Scale to the value below.

PlayerScale.title: Player Scale Multiplier
PlayerScale.tooltip: Changes the size of the player.

ScalePlayerSpeed.title: Change Player Speed to Match Size
ScalePlayerSpeed.tooltip: Changes the speed, jump height, and acceleration of the player to match its size.

ScalePlayerImpacts.title: Change Player's Impact Damage to Match Size
ScalePlayerImpacts.tooltip: Changes the amount of damage you take from impacts to match your size. Larger = more resilient.
